name: Cool Game :) (alpha 0.01)
description:
A first person shooter that was a Story Mode Robots turrets that shoot the robots to take heath from you (i dunno where that idea came from lul)  and a Survival Mode the game is in Alpha (0.0.1) and ive been working alot in it so it changed ALOT its going to be free and always free and probably an online mode (its very dificult with you watch Dani you will know)
